text_block_list.name: Shrine-carrying Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Shrine, coming through! Everyone<n>join us in the chant to
give us<n>strength!

text_block_list.name: Shrine-carrying Umamusume
text_block_list.text: And a one, two, hup! And a one, two,<n>hup!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I am moved! This year's shrine<n>procession is wonderfully
impactful as<n>always!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The audience numbers have already<n>broken records, so I
hear. Let us also<n>gear up to give our own<n>show-stopping
performances!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Y-yes, ma'am! Not long left now... 'til<n>the show... The big
show!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Yukino, you okay? We still have some<n>time, so why don't
we relax a little<n>and wander around over there?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Oh, um...

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
...No! I wanna go over the<n>choreography one last time with<n>
Curren! I'm fine, I promise!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Oh... okay. Do your thing.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
All right! The ending is looking good! ♪<n>You really nailed
getting it cute, Yukino!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Curren! Thank you so much! We're<n>so close to the
performance, but<n>you're still help'n me!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Don't sweat it! I want us all to look<n>super cute out there!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Curren! There you are! The<n>costume fitter was looking
for you.<n>Said they want to get started soon.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Ah! It's that time already? Thank you,<n>City. Well, Yukino, I'll
see you later!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Ever since the training camp, you've<n>been doing a lot of
practice with<n>Curren, haven't you?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Wha? Th-that's because... we're in<n>the same class...
maybe?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Um, City... Are you... m-mad at me?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: No, not really.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
...You know, you could've come to me<n>at least once. I get
that Curren has<n>more to teach you, but—

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: I-it's not that!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
I wanna be like you... No, I mean, I<n>wanted to make sure I
wouldn't<n>embarrass you! That's why...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Yukino...

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
I mean... the word's aren't com'n<n>out right. In any case,
I'm gonna give<n>it my all!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
With my head held high and pride in<n>my heart, I'll dance my
heart out!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(City is so beautiful. So, so beautiful.<n>I've always wanted
t'be just like<n>her.)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(And this time, I managed to look her<n>in the eyes and talk to
her without<n>runn'n away! Right now, I'm shar'n<n>the same
stage as her!)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(I want to stand tall like this forever! I<n>wanna be glitzy and
glam'rous too!)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
(Yukino—ah, can't get distracted. If<n>I'm not careful, all my
attention will go<n>on you.)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
(You look beautiful—tonight,<n>especially... But I won't be
outshone!)

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
(Look at those two go. The mood<n>between them is so
intense, the<n>audience can't keep their eyes off<n>them.)

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
(Well, that won't do at all. ♪ Look<n>over here, everybody.
Remember who<n>you all came to see?)

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
...Wow, look at City and Curren... even<n>Yukino. They all look
so dignified. So<n>beautiful... They're simply<n>awe-inspiring.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. You know, when I saw the<n>older students run in the
Kikuka Sho, I<n>began to wonder if I could really do<n>the
same...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: But now I'm determined. I'm gonna<n>give it my best too.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume C
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, the target's really not here!<n>They're inside the
sacred mountain!<n>They were really serious about doing<n>it
the traditional way?!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume D
text_block_list.text:
President Rudolf and Vice President<n>Brian look so powerful...
It's kinda<n>scary actually. But still... I can't wait<n>to see how
this turns out!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: (Hehe. Brian's idea is an instant<n>success.)

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Understood! So you're nominating<n>Curren Chan, Gold City,
and Yukino<n>Bijin to perform the ceremonial<n>dance,
correct?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Each one will bring a unique<n>color and charm to the
performance. I<n>believe they are all capable of<n>excelling in
this endeavor.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Approved! And as for the archery<n>show! The URA has sent
an official<n>notice that they'd like you to<n>participate. Will
you accept their<n>request?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
If they ask it of me, I shall oblige. As<n>for the other
participant, may I make a<n>very strong recommendation?

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Indubitably! Who is it?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Narita Brian. My indispensable<n>comrade.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Brian, do you remember the day I<n>made you vice president?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Naturally, I've never forgotten.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
You out of your mind? You want me to<n>be vice president of
the student<n>council? Ha, you've got to be joking.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Though I am currently learning to<n>jest, I am nowhere near
skilled<n>enough to unveil my jokes. This is an<n>earnest
request. Brian, I want to<n>appoint you as vice president.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
...Hold on. You were running the<n>student council on your own
until last<n>year.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
And then the one who went up<n>against you for
president—who was it,<n>Air Groove? She's your vice<n>
president now, right?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You've got twice the workforce now.<n>Isn't that enough?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Unfortunately, it is not, Brian. Now that<n>I have my right hand,
my ambition has<n>grown. I want to reach toward an<n>ideal
world, and for that, I'd like you to<n>join me.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
An Umamusume of pure instinct. A<n>soul that burns
passionately. It can<n>only be you, Brian.

text_block_list.name: Presenter Umamusume
text_block_list.text: The bonfire has been lit. The archery<n>show hereby begins!

text_block_list.name: Presenter Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Ready, set... go!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: GRRRAAAAAH!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
(Heh... Haha! There it is! It's enough<n>to give me
goosebumps! Brian, your<n>raging fangs... your ferocious<n>
instincts... they're as dazzling as<n>always!)

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: (And the way you look doing<n>archery...)

text_block_list.name: Umamusume C
text_block_list.text: Whoa, so cool... I'm trembling!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
(Your unveiled instincts, your<n>vigor—they're enough to stir
any<n>Umamusume's spirits!)

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: And it seems like I'm no exception!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Bow before me, "Beast"! HAAAAAH!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Aw, the Fleetfoot Festival went so<n>quickly. This year was
even more<n>lively than usual, I wish it would go on<n>longer...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. City's group dance and the<n>presidents' archery
really lit a fire in<n>me. I'll look back on this fondly.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Tonight's noble Fleetfoot Festival<n>ended without incident.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
May every Umamusume stay sound<n>of health, and may
they find glory in<n>their future.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes, indeed. Tonight's Fleetfoot<n>festival was simply...
superb.
